recipes.name: Parmesan Chicken
recipes.description: Chicken breasts are breaded with flavorful crumbs, herbs, and Parmesan cheese, then baked to a golden brown color.
recipes.ingredients: 2 tablespoons olive oil, 1 cup dry bread crumbs, 2/3 cup grated Parmesan cheese, 1 teaspoon dried basil leaves

recipes.name: Meat Loaf
recipes.description: Classic meatloaf made delicious using bread crumbs - a scrumptious dinner.
recipes.ingredients: 2 eggs, 1/2 cup ketchup, 1/2 cup milk, 1 cup of Bread Crumbs, 1/4 cup finely chopped onion, 1lb. lean ground beef

recipes.name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
recipes.description: Quick and easy grilled cheese sandwich
recipes.ingredients: 2 slices white bread, 2 tablespoons butter divided, 2 slices Cheddar cheese
